00035   LabviewConverter::LabviewConverter() : DataSourceProcessor("LabviewConverter")
00036   {
00037     
00038     _description = "Reads the ascii ahcal labview raw data files. Make sure to not specify any LCIOInputFiles in the steering in order to read the Calice native raw data files ." ;
00039     
00040     registerProcessorParameter( "Data" , 
00041                                 "Initial String to the ahcal data file. i.e. 'Run'"  ,
00042                                 _data ,
00043                                 //                              std::string("run270001.txt") ) ;
00044                                 std::string("test__06p12p2017__18o59o18.txt") ) ;
00045   
00046     registerProcessorParameter ( "Runnumber", "Runnumber", _runNumber, 270000);    
00047  
00048     registerProcessorParameter ( "SlowControlLineNumber", 
00049                                  "First part of Slow Control Block, HBU 120 lines, EPT 1920 lines,  AHC2M New Labview output 0 lines",
00050                                  _SlowControlLineNumber, 0);    
00051 
00052     registerProcessorParameter( "DetectorType" ,
00053                                 "Type name of the detector. Currently valid identifiers are: AHC2, AHC2M AEC" ,
00054                                 _detectorTypeName,
00055                                 std::string("AHC2M") ) ;
00056 
00057 
00058  
00059   }
00060   
00061   LabviewConverter*  LabviewConverter::newProcessor() { 
00062     return new LabviewConverter ;
00063   }

00071     
00072   void LabviewConverter::readDataSource( int numEvents ) {
00073    
00074     /*
00075     if( _detectorTypeName == "AEC" ){
00076       std::setlocale(LC_ALL,"ja_JP");
00077       std::setlocale(LC_TIME, "ja_JP");
00078     }
00079     */
00080 
00081     ifstream file_to_read;
00082     file_to_read.open( _data.c_str() );
00083     
00084     int rn = _runNumber;
00085     
00086     LCRunHeaderImpl* runHdr = new LCRunHeaderImpl ; 
00087     runHdr->setRunNumber( rn ) ;
00088     
00089     string detName("ahcal_next_generation")  ;
00090     runHdr->setDetectorName( detName ) ;
00091     
00092     stringstream description ; 
00093     description << " run: " << rn <<" is the raw data from Labview !" ;
00094     runHdr->setDescription( description.str()  ) ;
00095     
00096     ProcessorMgr::instance()->processRunHeader( runHdr  ) ;
00097     
00098     int read[12];
00099     
00100     int currentCycleNr = 1;
00101     int lastCycleNr = 1;
00102     bool CycleNrChanged = false;
00103     
00104     int LcioEventNr = 0;
00105     
00106     LConverter _ldata;
00107     
00108     std::string line;
00109     
00110     size_t foundDate;
00111     string strDate ("Date");
00112 
00113     size_t foundUnixtime;
00114     string strUnixtime ("Unixtime");
00115 
00116 
00117     size_t foundTepmetrature = 0;
00118     string strTemperature("Temperatures");
00119     int TemperatureTimeRange[2] = {0,0};
00120     bool writeoutTemperature = false;
00121     float TSensor[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0};
00122 
00123     int iEvtTime = 0;
00124     
00125     int SlowControlLineCounter = 0; //First 1920 lines in each CERN testbeam
00126 
00127     // **********************************************************
00128     //        Processing data
00129     //  build events according the the different BunchXID 
00130     //  within one CycleNr, and remove them, 
00131     //  until all collected data have been asigned to an event.
00132     //  Then readin the next CycleNr raw data.
00133     // **********************************************************
00134     while (!file_to_read.eof()) {
00135       
00136       for( int i = 0; i<12; i++) { read[i] = -1;}
00137       
00138       std::getline(file_to_read, line);
00139       //if(line[0] == '#') continue; //for comments
00140       
00141       if(line[0] == '#'){
00142         
00143         //Read SlowControl block
00144         //Read first 1920 lines for EPT SlowControl, HBU is 120 lines.
00145         if (SlowControlLineCounter < _SlowControlLineNumber )
00146           {
00147             streamlog_out(MESSAGE) << line <<std::endl;
00148             SlowControl << line;
00149             SlowControlLineCounter++;
00150           }
00151 
00152 
00153 
00154         //Read on Date/Time
00155         foundDate = line.find(strDate);
00156         if (foundDate!=string::npos) {
00157           //line.erase (0,20);
00158           //size_t foundDate2 = line.find(".");
00159           //if (foundDate2!=string::npos) {
00160           //  line.erase (foundDate2,1);
00161           //}
00162           streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" These events have been collected on date: " << line <<endl; 
00163           
00164           // convert this string into timestamp
00165           struct tm tm;
00166           //if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d %m %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00167           if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2"){
00168             line.erase (0,20);
00169             if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d. %b %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00170               time_t evtTimeDAQ;
00171               evtTimeDAQ = mktime(&tm);
00172               iEvtTime = (int)evtTimeDAQ;
00173               streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" And the Unix UTC Timestamp  is "  << evtTimeDAQ <<endl;
00174             }
00175             else {
00176               cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp in detector AHC2!"<<endl;
00177             }
00178           }
00179           else if( _detectorTypeName == "AEC"){
00180             line.erase (0,20);
00181             
00182             if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d. %b %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00183               time_t evtTimeDAQ;
00184               evtTimeDAQ = mktime(&tm);
00185               iEvtTime = (int)evtTimeDAQ;
00186               streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" And the Unix UTC Timestamp  is "  << evtTimeDAQ <<endl;
00187             }
00188             else {
00189               cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp in detector AEC!"<<endl;
00190               
00191             }
00192           }
00193           else {
00194             cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp!"<<endl;
00195             return;
00196           }
00197         }
00198 
00199         foundUnixtime = line.find(strUnixtime);
00200         if (foundUnixtime!=string::npos) {
00201 
00202           line.erase (0,12);
00203           stringstream(line)>>iEvtTime;
00204 
00205           streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" These events have been collected on date: " << line <<endl; 
00206 
00207 
00208         }
00209 
00210 
00211 
00212         //Read temperature
00213         foundTepmetrature = line.find(strTemperature);
00214 
00215         if (foundTepmetrature!=string::npos) {
00216 
00217           //Lastone
00218           TemperatureTimeRange[1] = TemperatureTimeRange[0];
00219           TemperatureTimeRange[0] = iEvtTime;
00220 
00221           if(writeoutTemperature)
00222             streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<TSensor[0]<<"   "
00223                            <<TSensor[1]<<"   "
00224                            <<TSensor[2]<<"   "
00225                            <<TSensor[3]<<"   "
00226                            <<TSensor[4]<<"   "
00227                            <<TSensor[5]<<"   "
00228                            <<"From "<<TemperatureTimeRange[0]
00229                            <<"  until "<<TemperatureTimeRange[1]
00230                            <<std::endl;
00231           
00232           //writeoutTemperature = true;
00233           writeoutTemperature = false;
00234 
00235           //New one
00236           line.erase (0,17);
00237 
00238           streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" And at this moment, the Temperatures are: " <<std::endl;
00239           streamlog_out(MESSAGE) << line <<std::endl;
00240           stringstream stream;
00241 
00242 
00243           if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2") {
00244             stream.imbue(std::locale("german"));
00245             //stream.imbue(std::locale("De_DE"));
00246             stream << line;
00247             stream>>TSensor[0]>>TSensor[1]>>TSensor[2]>>TSensor[3]>>TSensor[4]>>TSensor[5];
00248           }
00249           else if ( _detectorTypeName == "AEC") {
00250              stringstream(line)>>TSensor[0]>>TSensor[1]>>TSensor[2]>>TSensor[3]>>TSensor[4]>>TSensor[5];
00251           }
00252           else{
00253             std::cout << "This detecot type: "<< _detectorTypeName <<" is not valid identifiers currently!\n"
00254                       << "Currently valid identifiers are: AHC2 and AEC "<< std::endl;
00255             return;
00256           }
00257 
00258         }
00259         
00260         continue; //for comments
00261       }
00262       
00263       //  Sebastian Laurien : Email 5/23/2013 10:26 AM
00264       // where it was before: (dummy being unimportant stuff)
00265       // BXid>>Readoutcycle>>ASICid>>dummy>>memcell>>Ch>>TDC>>ADC>>dummy>>dummy>>HitBit>>GainBit
00266       //stringstream(line)>>read[0]>>read[1]>>read[2]>>read[3]>>read[4]>>read[5]>>read[6]>>read[7]>>read[8]>>read[9]>>read[10]>>read[11];
00267 
00268 
00269       //  Sebastian Laurien : Email 5/23/2013 10:26 AM
00270       //it is now
00271       //Readoutcycle>>BXid>>ASICid>>memcell>>Ch>>TDC>>ADC>>HitBit>>GainBit;
00272       stringstream(line)>>read[1]>>read[0]>>read[2]>>read[4]>>read[5]>>read[6]>>read[7]>>read[10]>>read[11];
00273       read[3] = 0;
00274       read[8] = 0;
00275       read[9] = 0;
00276        
00277       streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<"BunchXID: "<<read[0] <<"  CycleNr: "<<read[1]<<" ChipID: "<<read[2]<<"  Channel: " <<read[5] <<std::endl;
00278       
00279       
00280       currentCycleNr =read[1];
00281       
00282       
00283       if( lastCycleNr != currentCycleNr )
00284         {
00285           streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<"lastCycleNr: "<< lastCycleNr<<"  currentCycleNr:"<<currentCycleNr <<std::endl;
00286           CycleNrChanged = true;
00287           lastCycleNr = currentCycleNr;
00288           
00289           if( CycleNrChanged )
00290             {
00291               streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" _ldata.size(): "<<_ldata.GetBunchXID().size() <<std::endl;
00292               
00293               //swap BunchXID and EvtNr for CERN test beam data in November,
00294               //The known issue for the Labview DAQ wrong output for the BunchXID and EvtNr readout
00295               //_ldata.swapBunchXID();
00296               //_ldata.swapEvtNr();
00297 
00298               _ldata.Reverse();
00299               //Splite event according bunchXID within one CycleNr, count event number.
00300               
00301               int TotalRcdNr = _ldata.GetEvtNr().size();
00302               int MaxRcdEvtNr = _ldata.GetBunchXID().size()/36; //maximium events number
00303               
00304               streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "TotalRcdNr: " <<TotalRcdNr
00305                             << "     MaxRcdEvtNr: " <<MaxRcdEvtNr
00306                             << std::endl;
00307               
00308               
00309               for( int iEv = 0; iEv < MaxRcdEvtNr; iEv++ )
00310                 {
00311                   
00312                   if ( _ldata.GetBunchXID().size() == 0) break;
00313                   
00314                   //streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<< " ===== LabviewConverter processing Event "<< LcioEventNr <<"  ======" <<std::endl;
00315                   LCEventImpl*  evt = new LCEventImpl() ;
00316                   
00317  
00318                   LCCollectionVec *col = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00319                   
00320                   int size = _ldata.GetBunchXID().size() -1;
00321                   int currentBunchXID = _ldata.GetBunchXID().at( size );
00322                   
00323                   streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" size: "<<size <<std::endl;
00324                   
00325                   bool trigger1 =false;
00326                   bool trigger2 =false;
00327                   
00328                   //for( unsigned int i=0; i<_ldata.GetBunchXID().size(); i++) {
00329                   for( int i = size; i >= 0;  --i) {
00330                     
00331                     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<"_ldata.GetBunchXID().at("<<i<<"): "<<_ldata.GetBunchXID().at(i)
00332                                   <<" currentBunchXID: " << currentBunchXID
00333                                   <<std::endl;
00334 
00335                     if ( _ldata.GetBunchXID().at(i) == currentBunchXID )
00336                       {
00337                         // _ldata. PrintParameters(i);
00338                         
00339                         int iBxID = _ldata.GetBunchXID().at(i);
00340                         int iCyNr = _ldata.GetCycleNr().at(i);
00341                         int iCpID = _ldata.GetChipID().at(i);
00342                         int iAsNr = _ldata.GetASICNr().at(i);
00343                         int iEvNr = _ldata.GetEvtNr().at(i);
00344                         int iChan = _ldata.GetChannel().at(i);
00345                         int iTDC  = _ldata.GetTDC().at(i);
00346                         int iADC  = _ldata.GetADC().at(i);
00347                         int iXPos = _ldata.GetXPos().at(i);
00348                         int iYPox = _ldata.GetYPos().at(i);
00349                         int iHBit = _ldata.GetHitBit().at(i);
00350                         int iGBit = _ldata.GetGainBit().at(i);
00351 
00352                         // First event TDC is wrong. It is "0".
00353                         // Two triggers have the same BunchXID, both triggers exist
00354                         // Then write it out as an event.
00355                         if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2"){
00356                           if(iCpID == 129 && iChan == 35 && iTDC > 0) trigger1 =true;
00357                           if(iCpID == 137 && iChan == 35 && iTDC > 0) trigger2 =true;
00358                         }
00359                         else if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2M"){
00360                           if(iCpID == 133 && iChan == 35 && iTDC > 0) trigger1 =true;
00361                           if(iCpID == 141 && iChan == 35 && iTDC > 0) trigger2 =true;
00362                         }
00363                         else if( _detectorTypeName == "AEC"){
00364                           // Write out all data
00365                           trigger1 =true;
00366                           trigger2 =true;
00367                         }
00368                         else{
00369                           std::cout << "This detector type: "<< _detectorTypeName <<" is not valid identifiers currently!\n"
00370                                     << "Currently valid identifiers are: AHC2 and AEC "<< std::endl;
00371                           return;
00372                         }
00373 
00374                         LabviewBlock * lBlock = new LabviewBlock(iBxID, iCyNr, iCpID, iAsNr, iEvNr, iChan, 
00375                                                                  iTDC, iADC, iXPos, iYPox, iHBit, iGBit);
00376                         
00377                         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<"iBxID: "<<iBxID<<" iCyNr: "<<iCyNr<<" iCpID: "<<iCpID
00378                                       <<" Channel: " <<iChan <<" i: "<<i <<std::endl;
00379                         
00380                         
00381                         _ldata.Erase(i);
00382                         col->addElement( lBlock );
00383 
00384                         
00385                         
00386                       } // Add event element
00387                     
00388                   } // complete one event
00389                      
00390                   // keep this event if both trigger1 and trigger2 are true
00391                   // else delete this collection "col".
00392                   if (trigger1 && trigger2)
00393                     {
00394                       LcioEventNr++; //Event start from 1.
00395                       
00396                       evt->setRunNumber(  rn   ) ;
00397                       evt->setEventNumber( LcioEventNr ) ;
00398                       LCTime evttime( iEvtTime ) ;
00399                       evt->setTimeStamp( evttime.timeStamp()  ) ;
00400                       evt->addCollection( col, "LabviewData" );
00401 
00402                       //if(foundTepmetrature!=string::npos){
00403                       if (writeoutTemperature){
00404                         LCCollectionVec *TCol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00405                         
00406                         for( int i = 0; i<6; i++){
00407                           float temp = TSensor[i];          
00408                           TempSensorBlock  *TSensor = new TempSensorBlock(i, temp);
00409                           TCol->addElement(TSensor );
00410                         }
00411                         
00412                         evt->addCollection( TCol, "TSensor");
00413                         foundTepmetrature = 0;
00414                         writeoutTemperature = false;
00415                       }
00416                   
00417                       ProcessorMgr::instance()->processEvent( evt ) ;
00418 
00419                       trigger1 = false;
00420                       trigger2 = false;
00421 
00422                     }
00423                   else{  delete col;  }
00424 
00425                   // ------------ IMPORTANT ------------- !
00426                   // we created the event so we need to delete it ...
00427                   delete evt ;
00428                  
00429                      
00430                 } //get next event in this cycle
00431               
00432               _ldata.Clear();
00433               
00434               streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" After clear, _ldata.size(): "
00435                             <<_ldata.GetBunchXID().size() <<std::endl;
00436               
00437               CycleNrChanged = false;
00438               
00439             } //Complete splite the event in this cycle
00440 
00441           
00442         } // if the current Cycle is completed read in
00443       
00444 
00445       _ldata.SetLConverter(read);
00446 
00447 
00448     }
00449 
00450 
00451     file_to_read.close();
00452     
00453     delete runHdr ;
00454     
00455   }

00459   void LabviewConverter::end() {    
00460     streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" ===== End of LabviewConverter processor ===== " << std::endl;
00461   }
